text: Euphorbia leptoclada is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to Yemen. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical dry shrubland. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Socotra leptoclada Category:Data deficient plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Isaac Bayley Balfour
title: Euphorbia leptoclada
